title: Auto Enable Audio to Haptics
body: Amazing work, this is much better than DSX. Is there any way to auto enable audio to haptics when app is opened, instead of manually clicking the start button?
author: Rivridis

comments.body:
1. Check "Run audio to haptics on start" in Haptic Feedback tab
2. Save config in Config tab
3. Set default config for this port in Config tab and open the config you've saved

Now Audio To Haptics window should open by itself when you run the app with controller plugged in that specific USB port
Yup, works perfectly. Just a small nitpick, but the haptics audio popup is not auto minimizing when Hide to Tray is on. Not a big deal though, so closing the issue. Thanks for the hard work.

satisfaction_conditions: Audio to haptics functionality must start automatically when the application is launched
No disruptive interface elements when auto-starting

title: RacingDSX compatibility
body:
Affter using DSY with RacingDSX without any problems, I switched over to DSY-v2. The connection works but the triggers behave in a very different way, at least for Forza Horizon 5 (too snappy). I don't think it is the intended way of working

Thank you for your hard working
author: eapiova

comments.body: The triggers in old DSY were set-up incorrectly and many effects were missing. In V2 trigger effects are 1:1 like in DSX ver 1.4.9

You're right I tested it with DSX 1.4.9 and the effects are indeed the same as your DSY-v2, even if in RacingDSX they said they only tested with DSX 2 and 3.1 I guess the implementation is the same. Thanks for the explanation

satisfaction_conditions: Explanation of trigger behavior differences between DSY versions
Confirmation of intended compatibility with specific DSX versions
